title: S-014 PydanticAI Gateway Client (Story)

title: S-014: Create Gateway client module
description:
## Context
CRITICAL: This is the Gateway-only enforcement point. All LLM inference MUST go through this module. No direct provider SDK imports allowed anywhere else.

## Implementation Notes
- Create /backend/app/gateway/client.py
- Create GatewayClient class with async httpx client
- Read PYDANTIC_GATEWAY_API_KEY from config
- Implement generate() method with retry + exponential backoff
- Base URL: https://api.pydantic.ai/gateway

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] GatewayClient class exists with generate() method
- [ ] Reads API key from environment (not hardcoded)
- [ ] Implements retry with 1s, 2s, 4s backoff on failure
- [ ] Max 3 retries before raising exception
- [ ] No other module imports OpenAI/Anthropic SDKs directly

## Test Notes
- Unit test with mocked httpx responses
- Test retry behavior with simulated failures
- Integration test with real Gateway (optional, requires key)

## Security Notes
- PYDANTIC_GATEWAY_API_KEY read from env only
- Never log the API key
- Structured logging for requests (no secrets)
close_reason: Gateway client module created with generate() method, retry logic, and proper security
